comments:
Running my host in the default 1.5 vm on Mac, launched a runtime workbench with the option to clear workspace on launch.  Eclipse has no problems launching, but if the Installed JRE Preference page, the Execution Environments preference page, or the new Java project wizard are started, the following exception occurs.

eclipse.buildId=N20070416-0010
java.version=1.5.0_07
java.vendor=Apple Computer, Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=macosx, ARCH=x86, WS=carbon, NL=en_US
Framework arguments:  -product org.eclipse.sdk.ide -pdelaunch
Command-line arguments:  -product org.eclipse.sdk.ide -data /Users/cwindatt/Documents/workspace/../runtime-New_configuration -dev file:/Users/cwindatt/Documents/workspace/.metadata/.plugins/org.eclipse.pde.core/Runtime Workbench/dev.properties -pdelaunch -os macosx -ws carbon -arch x86
